allow: Bash(docker-compose exec app composer require darkaonline/l5-swagger)
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan vendor:publish --provider "L5Swagger\L5SwaggerServiceProvider")
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan l5-swagger:generate)
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan make:migration add_status_to_users_table --table=users)
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate)
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan db:seed --class=RoleSeeder)
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan tinker --execute="App\Models\User::whereNull(''status'')->update([''status'' => ''active'']);")
Bash(docker-compose exec app php artisan route:list --path=admin/users)
